resources.string: This is the mortal enemy of Nick, destroy them for your desire revenge
This is the protagonist of the game, you must carry to quench his revenge by casting spells
This is nick\'s motion control, enjoy it!
Nick\'s life, appears in the upper left corner of the device, you start whit three lives that are decreasing as you suffer damage
This is the grimoire of ice, whit this book Nick will learn to use ice and his spells will become cold, find it around the map!
This is Nick attack button, by default it throws fire, but if you catch the grimoire, this throws ice!
